# Calendar

wovoui's custom <Calendar> component generates a WAI-ARIA compliant calendar style date selection widget, which can be used to control other components, or can be used to create customized date picker inputs.

# Overview

<Calendar> is WAI-ARIA accessibility compliant, optimized for keyboard control (arrow, page up/down, home, and end keys). Internationalization is also supported, and default's to the browser's or page's locale, if no locale(s) are specified.

SunMonTueWedThuFriSat
<Calendar/>
